Header.title: We are
Header.paragraph: India's leading platform for DMIT, Midbrain Activation, and brain-based learning programs to unlock your child’s hidden potential.

About.paragraph: At Upgrade Your Child™, we believe every child is born with unique strengths and talents. Through scientific tools like DMIT and midbrain activation, we help children unlock their true potential. Our goal is to guide both children and parents on a journey of brain-based learning and emotional growth.

Features.title: DMIT Analysis
Features.text: Discover your child’s inborn talents and learning style using fingerprint-based scientific analysis.

Features.title: Midbrain Activation
Features.text: Improve focus, memory, and intuition through fun and safe midbrain stimulation exercises.

Features.title: Parent Counseling
Features.text: Personalized guidance for parents to support their child’s growth and career planning early on.

Features.title: Child Brain Training
Features.text: Fun-based brain development programs to boost confidence, creativity, and emotional intelligence.
